Header: 54 Division Cleans Kovil Premises ahead of Maha Shivarathri Pooja
Content: 54 Division troops of the SFHQ-Wanni, ahead of the Maha Shivarathri Day conducted a Shramadana campaign and cleaned the Thiruketheswarn Kovil premises on Friday (1). The Shramadana campaign was launched under the supervision of the General Officer Commanding 54 Division, Brigadier Senarath Bandara. 05 Officers and 85 other ranks participated in the Shramadana campaign.  It was continued throughout the day .The Secretary and the Kovil Committee extended their gratitude to the troops for the enormous support given to them.
